entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet workload install does not support verbosity flag #32404

Closed

  • Resolving of FrameworkReference is inconsistent if the framework dll also has a NuGet-Package #32406
  • dotnet new globaljson causes MSB4236: Microsoft.DOtNet.Arcade.Sdk could not be found #24085
    Discussion
  • [release/3.1] Tests will fail when testing 2.1 with a stage0 #12558
  • There is a directory /.dotnet #12544
  • Running tests with coverage + signed assembly + Directory.Build.props fail on NET5 preview6 #12309

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning for optional workload EOL #32426
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [draft][release/7.0.4xx] removed restriction on Publish SDK to allow publishing non-web project #32422
    Area-Containers

Merged

  • [Own build] Don't use AssemblyInformationCachePaths #32355
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clarifying .NET version in test #32131
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32338
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2177895 #32408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add known TFMs to multitarget-publish error message #32333
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32390
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the NETSDK1094 errors #32058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove duplicate packages #32347
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #32339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • Handle Uri-less Realms during basic auth, and fix auth lookups for hosts with ports specified #32371
    Area-Containers
  • Update dependabot to run on 4xx #31837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • support correct property name and ensure compat with old name #32085
    Area-Containers
  • Container Build: multiple registry push, single archive for multiple tags, tar.gz file writing. #32132
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.3xx] added `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils.dll` to package content #32375
    Servicing-consider, Area-Containers
  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
